games.name: Deathloop
games.description: A time-looping first-person shooter game in which the player takes on the role of Colt, an assassin trapped in a time loop on the island of Blackreef. Colt must eliminate eight targets in a single day to break the loop and escape the island, while being pursued by rival assassin Julianna.

games.name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
games.description: Open-world action-adventure game in which the player controls Link as he explores the land of Hyrule, solving puzzles and battling enemies to defeat the evil Calamity Ganon.

games.name: Minecraft
games.description: Sandbox game in which the player can build and explore blocky 3D worlds, gathering resources and crafting tools and structures.

games.name: Fortnite
games.description: Multiplayer battle royale game in which 100 players fight to be the last one standing on an island, gathering weapons and building structures to gain an advantage.

games.name: League of Legends
games.description: Multiplayer online battle arena game in which two teams of players compete to destroy each other's base while defending their own, using a variety of champions with unique abilities.

games.name: Grand Theft Auto V
games.description: Action game in which the player can explore an open world, complete missions, and engage in various activities such as driving, shooting, and heists.

games.name: FIFA 22
games.description: Sports simulation game in which the player can control a team and compete in various soccer matches and tournaments.

games.name: Among Us
games.description: Online multiplayer game in which players work together on a spaceship, but some are secretly impostors trying to sabotage and kill the others, while the crew tries to identify and vote off the impostors.
